    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbilityPane
    This class represents the section for activating temporary perks (buffs).
    BaseItem
    Base class for all shop items.
    ButtonPane
    This class represents the main interaction area where the player clicks to earn money.
    Buyable
    [cite_start]Defines the contract for items that can be bought[cite: 140].
    GameManager
    This class manages the game state, including money, inventory, perks, and the game loop.
    GamePane
    This class represents the main layout of the game application.
    Generator
    Represents an item that generates passive income.
    ImageLoader
    Utility class for loading images resources.
    ItemPane
    This class represents a single item entry in the shop.
    Main
    The entry point of the JavaFX application.
    Perk
    This class represent temporary perks to buff skill of mouse click and generator.
    ShopPane
    This class represents the shop area, displaying lists of purchasable items categorized by type.
    ToolUpgrade
    Represents an item that boosts a specific generator's output.
    Upgrade
    Represents an item that increases click power.
    Upgradeable
    [cite_start]Defines the contract for objects that update over time[cite: 143].
